testcase.name: Login to Amazon site
testcase.system-out: Given User has launched the site and is on home page........................passed When User clicks on "Sign in" button........................................passed Then Login page should be displayed.........................................passed And User enters the Email or Mobile number and click on "Continue" button...passed And User enters the password and click on "Login" button....................passed Then User should be logged in successfully and Homepage should be launched with Hello "username"..passed
